content: Create new branch for photo management system
Create polymorphic Photo model with ContentType framework
Create migration to move HuntPhoto data to Photo model
Enhance S3Manager with bulk operations and cleanup methods
Create unified PhotoViewSet with polymorphic support
Implement PhotoSerializer with generic content object support
Create centralized PhotoManager React component
Build photo management UI with delete, edit, reorder functionality
Implement bulk operations (multi-select, bulk delete, bulk edit)
Update Hunt model and views to use new Photo model
Add comprehensive tests for photo management system
Test migration from HuntPhoto to Photo model
Fix E203 vs Black formatting conflict (disable E203 in flake8 config)
Commit changes and create comprehensive pull request
Fix Docker container flake8 config to resolve CI failures
Fix testlint-quick script merge conflicts and Docker configuration
Resolve CI flake8 failures (W503 and C901 complexity errors)
Resolve merge conflicts with main branch
Fix invalid DragHandleDots2 icon import causing TypeScript build failure
Celebrate successful merge of comprehensive photo management system! ðŸŽ‰
